duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, design, plan, implement, administer, control, and optimize the IBM z/OS storage environments.
Understand complex storage infrastructures, design, deploy, and manage without supervision.
Champion the needs of customer community and enhance user experience related to storage performance and reliability.
Act as technical point of contact (SME) for the zEnterprise Storage platform.
Backup and recovery of z/OS systems for business continuity and Disaster Recovery testing.
Provide technical assistance to programming and operations staffs.
Develop, test, and implement System Managed Storage's Automated Class Selection (ACS) routines to implement storage management policies.

Enforce storage rules and standards, monitor DASD/Tape usage, ensure data integrity, and maintain catalogues, and the routines of z/OS storage backup, archive, migration, restore, compression, idle space release, management reporting, and DASD conversion and/or movement.
Use and/or administer IBM utilities, DFSMSdfp, DFSMSdss, DFSMS, DFSMShsm, DFSMSrmm; DIF/ACC/SRS, and Catalog Recovery Plus. BVIR Reporting CA-PDSMAN; SMP/E TREX

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
